item.title: Interoperability with Cisco/Juniper
item.author: Enthusiastic Hugo User
item.description: We checked GoPlane/GoBGP’s EVPN/VXLAN implementation works well with Cisco Nexus9000 series and Juniper QFX5100 at Interop Tokyo 2015 Shownet ! GoPlane/GoBGP was running on Quanta LY8/Cumulus Linux 2.5.2.
